remarks: An alternate definition of the conditional operator ~ df-if with one fewer connectives (but probably less intuitive to understand). (Contributed by NM, 30-Jan-2006.)
statement:
dfif2 $p |- if ( ph , A , B ) = { x | ( ( x e. B -> ph ) -> ( x e. A /\ ph ) ) } $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
